name: v2.6.7

* Fix gift command not working

Changelog:

* Fix `DivorceRequiresPriest: auto` not working correctly

* Fix divorce broadcast message not behaving correctly
* Add `/marry partners` command

name: v2.6.1

name: v2.6
body:
## Changelog:
* Add support for MC 1.19
* Add support for RGB display names
* [Update cn.yml](https://github.com/GeorgH93/MarriageMaster/commit/2bda875d177ec739451319d7ec1fb330a5944c5a) (thanks to YuanYuanOwO)

name: v2.5.6
body:
## Changelog:
* Add support for Minecraft 1.18.2
* Add beta support for PluginManager (please do not use PluginManager with this plugin)
* Update en.yml to be gender neutral (thanks to hahaluckyme) #251
* Update cn.yml (thanks to BillZhucn) #249 
* Update ru.yml (thanks to stashenko) #248 
* Fix issues with some config options not working correctly

name: v2.5.5.1
body:
## Changelog:
* Fix broken formatting in language files

name: v2.5.5
body:
## Changelog:
* Improve loading performance
* Fix issue with BackpackCommand
* Fix issue that exposed vanished players with surname or divorce command
* Fix color tab auto complete for SetColorCommand

name: v2.5.4
body:
## Changelog:
* Minor performance improvements for loading and chat

name: v2.5.3
body:
## Changelog:
* Fixed bugs with command /marry chat settarget all (Thanks to Qveshn) (#239)
  * Added the ability to reset the recipient of private messages (/marry chat settarget all)
  * Added tab complete for "settarget"/"target"
  * Added tab complete for "all" switch in "settarget" subcommand
  * Fixed description for settarget subcommand
* Fixed bug with marriages duplicates in multi-partners mode (Thanks to Qveshn) (#239)
* Improve loading performance
* Remove old config/language file converter (everyone that is still using v1.x should first upgrade to v2.5.2)

name: v2.5.2.1
body:
## Changelog:
*  Fix issue with MagicHeart placeholder in standalone mode

name: v2.5.2
body:
## Changelog:
* Fix bug with wrong description for pvpon/pvpoff sub-commands (Thanks to Qveshn) (#233)
* Fix formatting issues with list footers (#234)
* Check `marry.bypass.gift.gamemode` also for recipient (partner) in gift command (Thanks to Qveshn) (#235)
* Fixed double hearts for placeholder MagicHeart (Thanks to Qveshn) (#236)
* Fixed bug with {Time} and {TimeLeft} in hug command (Thanks to Qveshn) (#238)

name: v2.5.1
body:
## Changelog:
* Add support for Minecraft 1.18
* Add SurnameChangeEvent and SurnameChangedEvent
* Add cost for surname changes (#227) 
* Update Spanish language file (thanks to FrannDzs)
* Improve loading performance on MC 1.17
* Fix lag on first use of gift command on Minecraft 1.17
* Fix lag exploit on Minecraft 1.16+ in online mode
* Fix mistake in English language file

name: v2.5
body:
## Changelog:
* Add placeholders to married dialog
* Add `marry.bypass.serverblacklist` permission to bypass server blacklist
* Add admin notification if there was a problem loading data
* Add kiss and hug to API
* Add option to disable kiss interaction
* Add config options for hug command
* Add warning if there is no translation for a placeholder
* Add debug command
* Update Chinese language file (thanks to HuangJin)
* Fix lost items if the inventory of the sender is full when the gift request is denied/canceled/failed
* Fix lost item if the gift request was never sent because the partner already has an open request

name: v2.4.2
body:
## Changelog:
* Add Korean translation (thanks to happykrcheese)
* Run cleanup command to remove invalid wedding dates form database
* Allow unsafe teleports for flying players
* Allow negative y positions for MC 1.17 and newer (#204)
* Fix API not available in standalone mode

name: v2.4.1
body:
## Changelog:
* Fix issues with gift command

name: v2.4
body:
## Changelog:
*  Add support for MC 1.17 (Closes #197)
* Add IsInRange_____ placeholders
* Add partner name placeholders for multi partner setups
* Add option to prevent players from receiving items in certain gamemodes (default blocks all but survival)
* Fix startup issue with Java 16 and BungeeCord
* Fix issues with normal mode in release builds

name: v2.3.1
body:

name: v2.2.8
body:
## Changelog:
* Add compatibility with MC 1.16.3
* Improve handling of legacy formatted messages
* Fix missing colors in action bar messages
* Fix for list command exposing vanished players (#159)
* Allow floating point numbers for the Kiss.WaitTime config option (#160) 
*  Use legacy formatting for bundled language files
    * All messages that don't need json formatting have been converted to legacy formatting
    * This should make the language files more user friendly to edit

name: v2.2.7
body:
## Changelog:
* Fix MagicHeart PAPI placeholder not working in standalone mode

name: v2.2.6
body:

* Performance improvements for MC 1.16.2
* Improved handling for none JSON messages
* Fix auto complete private chat exposing vanished players (#157)
* Fix error when using the `/marry setcolor` command in standalone mode

name: v2.2.4
body:

* Allow the {MagicHeart} placeholder in the private chat format (for language file key: Language.Ingame.Chat.Format)
* Keep cached Misc.ServerName when upgrading the config file
* Fix a bug that made the API not work on some forks of Paper

name: v2.2.3
body:
## Changelog:
* Fix error when using the surname command without any arguments
* Fix some errors and bugs when using MySQL
* Reduce priority of the Spigot update provider
* Add some more comments with details to the config file

name: v2.2.2
body:
## Changelog
* Add RGB message support for MC 1.16 (only for JSON formatted messages in the language file)
* Add hidden `/marry reload database` command, that only reloads the database
* Fix an error when trying to divorce from an offline player without the "marry.offlinedivorce" permission
* Fix comment in config
* Fix error on disable with PAPI v2.10.7
* Some small performance improvements (mostly for MC 1.15 and 1.16)

name: v2.2.1
body:
## Changelog:
* Fix bug that prevented the plugin from loading marriages when Surnames are used

name: v2.2
body:

* Add support for MC 1.16
* Allow MagicHeart as placeholder in the marry list
* Allow players to change the color of the magic heart
* Define additional aliases for the MagicHeart placeholder
* Fix some bugs on BungeeCord

name: v2.1.10
body:
## Changelog:
* Add Portuguese-Brazilian language file (thanks Gustavo_Player)
* Add new custom help option
* Add some comments to the config
* Fix error when using MySQL
* Fix wrong behavior of suffix enable option
* Fix error when using gift confirmations
* Fix PlugMan compatibility (plugin can now be loaded with PlugMan, but will show a warning, I do not recommend doing it)

name: v2.1.9
body:
## Changelog:
* Update Chinese language file (thanks BillZhucn)
* Allow the same placeholders for prefix and suffix
* Fix double chat message if sending/receiving player of a private chat message is also spying on the private chat
* Fix some bugs related to teleports

name: v2.1.8.1
body:
## Changelog:
* Add update channel config option 
* Fix exception on disable

name: v2.1.8
body:
## Changelog:
* New update logic
    * Increased reliability (auto update should continue to work when CurseForge breaks their API again)
    * Support for multiple update channels (Release, Master, Dev), will be selected automatically based on where you download the plugin form
* Fix economy using wrong values (tp prices for everything) (thanks Brokkonaut) #135
* Hide vanished players in `/marry listpriests` #51 
* Overwrite delayed teleports instead of keeping them all
* Add Dutch language file (thanks Xelium)

name: v2.1.7
body:
## Changelog:
* Fix NullPointerException on divorce #131

name: v2.1.6
body:
## Changelog:
* Bugfix for SkillAPI Premium
* Bugfixes for private chat #131
    * Private chat toggle is no longer active when the player is not married
    * Private chat target will be removed when a player gets divorced from the current target
    * Private chat no longer sends commands as private chat messages on BungeeCord

name: v2.1.5
body:
## Changelog:
* Add missing permission to marry.user permission group
* Fix formatting for none JSON messages
* Fix error with mcMMO
* Fix magic heart placeholder
* Fix bugs with tab complete
    * Priests can now use tab complete for both players with just `/marry` instead of being forced to use `/marry marry` in order to use tab complete on the second player
    * Players without the `marry.bypass.vanish` permission will no longer be able to see vanished players while using autocomplete
* Improve chat toggle compatibility with some chat plugins

name: v2.1.4
body:
## Changelog:
* Update Chinese language file
* Make plugin more resilient to db startup problems
* Fix player name changes not being updated in the database for married players #118
* Fix release builds on BungeeCord for MC 1.15

name: v2.1.3
body:
## Changelog:
* Add comment for PartnerNowOnline/Offline messages
* Add partner name/displayname placeholder to item sent/received messages
* Add option to share xp with all partners in range
* Improve item name resolver (use item display name if available)
* Fix to high default radius for some actions
* Send reload message only to command sender

name: v2.1.2
body:
## Changelog:
* Fix regression introduced with v2.1 for finding the nearest partner (this should fix null-pointer exceptions for commands like tp or seen when the partner is offline)

name: v2.1.1
body:
## Changelog:
*  Fix command execution when no priest is used (fixes #107)

name: v2.1
body:
## Changelog:
* Add bonus xp for SkillAP
* Add bonus xp for mcMMO (closes #67)
* Add Placeholders: marriagemaster_home, marriagemaster_homecoordinates, marriagemaster_prefix, marriagemaster_suffix
* Add option to customize the formatting of placeholders (closes #89)
    * Introduce formatting for data placeholders, the formatted version will be used automatically if the "Married" value for the placeholder contains a String.format formatting code
    * Make the config a bit simpler
    * Define the default not married values for all the heart and prefix/suffix placeholders to empty string
    * Allow all boolean placeholders to overwrite the True and False definitions separately
    * Load the values for all static placeholders (these that always show the same value if a player is married) from the language file
    * Add an option to set the separator (PartnerList and PartnerDisplayNameList) for list placeholders
* Add world blacklist and accept requests to gifts (closes #10)
* Add command to list all online priests
* Remove useUUIDs option -> UUIDs are now always in use!
* Remove space if prefix or suffix is not used
* Fix nearest partner search
* Fix surname related bugs
    * Surenames can now be removed with the remove keyword (fixes #81)
    * The Marriage.Surnames.Force option should now work again
* Update German language file
* Check PCGF PluginLib version before using it (and use Standalone mode if version is to old) (Release builds only)

* Add Spanish translation (thanks AgustinEzequiel2)
* Fix some issues with the UUID converter

* Fix teleport issues with grass and flowers (Fixes #100)

name: v2.0.2
body:
## Changelog:
*    Fix missing space after priest name in Marry.Confirm message
*    Fix missing formatting in Divorce.Confirm message
*    Fix command executor only using OnMarry and OnDivorce instead of OnMarryWithPriest and OnMarryWithDivorce
*    Fix wrong name being used in Marry.Confirm message

name: v2.0.1
body:
## Changelog:
*    Fix error if the world of a home no longer exists on a server
*    Fix error with the data migration from files to SQLite
*    Fix error in config files converted from Marriage Master v1.x
*    Fix bug where settings were not loaded correctly directly after the migration requiring a server reload/restart

name: v2.0
body:
## Changelog:
* Completely rewritten
  * Performance improvements
  * Bugfixes (and maybe add some new bugs to fix later)
  * A more flexible code design that should allow this plugin to grow even further
* More customizations
  * Every message can be changed or disabled
  * Every message sent to the client can be a json (this means you now can define texts for hovering and click actions)
  * Messages work with name or display name, you are no longer forced to display names
  * Messages now have more placeholders and they are proper named to make it easier to adjust stuff
  * Every message can be sent to the client as chat message, action bar message, title, subtitle message, the send method can be configured for every single message
  * There are lots of new messages and config options
  * Every command, sub-command and flag can be translated
  * Every range check can now be: disabled, same-world or a range
  * Optional colored heart showing the marriage status (gray = unmarried, red = married)
* Allows multiple partners (players now can marry more than one player, needs to be enabled in the config)
* New commands
  * Hug
  * Seen
  * Version
* API that allows other plugins to interact. (the API is so powerful that 90% of the plugins features are implemented only using functions from the API)
* New database type: SQLite (replaces Files, your old data will be converted automatically)
* Console log now comes with colors
* More robust and faster database back-end
* New config file with comments!!!
  * You no longer need to open a extra documentation page in your browser to know what a value is doing and what is allowed
  * Comments stay when the plugin changes something in the config file
  * Your old config will be automatically converted into the new format
* Support for Placeholder-APIs, provides placeholders to MVdWPlaceholderAPI and Clip's PlaceholderAPI
